body:
fit() should never be called in a loop. I know this is from an old example and you didn't do it, but as part of moving this example to the learn/ directory we have to update it to current best practices.

Instead, use steps=100, and if you want to output a score regularly, use a ValidationMonitor.
body_html:
fit() should never be called in a loop. I know this is from an old example and you didn't do it, but as part of moving this example to the learn/ directory we have to update it to current best practices.

Instead, use steps=100, and if you want to output a score regularly, use a ValidationMonitor.
body_text:
fit() should never be called in a loop. I know this is from an old example and you didn't do it, but as part of moving this example to the learn/ directory we have to update it to current best practices.
Instead, use steps=100, and if you want to output a score regularly, use a ValidationMonitor.
